website_summaries.verdict: With an aluminum top that comes in versatile colors to compliment almost any phone, this PopSocket has both a durable feel and nice look.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for the metal top that has a sturdier feel than other PopSockets that are made entirely of plastic
Comes in several colors that contrast nicely with the black background
cons: Slightly pricier than some other designs by the brand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a big phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this immediately after I bought my IPhone XR. I really needed it because I wasn’t used to the weight and size of the new phone and my hand was starting to cramp up (and I dropped my phone on my face a few times lol). This doesn’t just save me from dropping and breaking my phone, it makes it feel lighter, and the additional support allows me to use the phone with one hand and reach the other side of my keyboard. PLUS I got the pop socket holder and use it in my car. Love this product. It solves a problem and makes my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Item came scratched and dirty! Poor quality control, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: itsthetOothfairy

customer_reviews.title: Falling off new phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second popsocket I’ve purchased and this second time was such a disappointment. I’ve never had issues before until now. Got myself the new iPhone XS Max and put my new popsocket on it. After only about 4 hours it fell off while I was using it. Then continues to fall off as I use it. Not sure if it’s the quality that’s suffered or what but I’m certainly not happy about it and will look for other options now.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Did not stay attached to my phone case
customer_reviews.text: The PopSocket is exactly the color and size I had hoped for. Unfortunately, it does not stick to my phone case. It seems to stay put when flat, but detaches as soon as you expand it - which is the entire purpose of having one. I know it is this PopSocket and not my phone case as I had another (different brand) that worked perfectly, it was just the wrong color. So, I am back to using the one that doesn't really match the case but works. And, I am returning this one. The adhesive on the back feels totally different than the other one I have, which is probably why it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STICK
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes it would be exactly like the popsocket i had before but boy was i wrong. The day i placed it on my case(used w/other popsockets and no issues) it wld stay but as soon as I wld pull out the popsocket and hold my phone , I would have about 2 seconds for it to completely come off! I gave it more chances and even thought maybe i needed a couple days of not touching the socket for it to completely stick and i was wrong again. Just buy elsewhere honestly, im not the only one complaining about it not sticking so that should say something.
customer_reviews.author: Denir

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered pop socket brand, and it came off in under 2 weeks, won't stick to my phone. I have a smooth surface phone case, so not sure why it didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this pop-socket
customer_reviews.text: I love this pop-socket! I bought this in like February 2017 and it did not fall off / break until JULY 2018!!!! And that was even with me changing it from one phone case to another! This is seriously worth it to get rather than the cheap 99 cent ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my PopSocket!! Been wanting one ever since I went to the hairdresser and noticed one on her phone. It works just like it says it does! I was worried that it would pop off when I was pulling it out but it's super sticky and stays put...yet I can unstick it to move it to a different part of my phone. I have seen cheaper imitation ones and I'm glad I got the real deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Cute but don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Pop socket came off a couple days after I installed it. Put it back on and hasn’t had a problem since. I have the rose gold metallic one. The surface scratches very easily so that was disappointing. Overall it’s smooth and easy to use. Just sad it scratches. UPDATE: one month after having it on and it has officially come off and won’t adhere back on. So it worked for one month and 4 days. Enough that I can’t return it. Boooooooo. I have a basic jelly plastic case. Nothing fancy or crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came off a month later
customer_reviews.text: Pop sockets are supposed to stick. I got this January 14,2019. Today is February 24,2019 and it just came off.my phone wasn’t dropped, wet, hit, etc... literally laying in my bed on social media and it came off in my hand. So pissed?
customer_reviews.author: ImSooCHI

customer_reviews.title: Faulty or just bad?
customer_reviews.text: All of my friends insisted that I buy a pop socket and that they work and stick really well. But this one did not :( on my phone case that has a material that pop sockets usually stick to, the pop socket would not stay on if any pressure was put on it. I tried using the little sheet that is used for iPhone x’s, but it still did not work. Im guessing it was faulty? Or are they just bad? Either way, it didn’t work for me :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped sticking to my phone within one month, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: A Griego

customer_reviews.title: this particular one did not stick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several pop sockets over the past couple years & I love them. This particular one did not stay adhered to my phone. It would fall off while I was holding the phone, causing me to drop my phone. All in all I love pop sockets and I’ve never had an issue, so I don’t know why this one would not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Does not adhere well (for long period of time) . Case or no case
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. I have ordered two of these in the last three months. I have used them on a case and without a case on my iphone 11. I would. I recommend they price is not worth the life. My popsocket is reattach-able but it falls off at least three times a week when I try to use it as instructed. It could have been a great product if it stuck to my phone. I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Onje

customer_reviews.title: All good...until it falls off
customer_reviews.text: This pop socket was easy to attach, looks good (I bought the rosegold), and works well...until it doesn’t. I’ve had this for less than a month. After about 3 weeks it fell off which is the reason I’m giving it one star. I reattached it, and it fell off again within a few days. My previous pop socket lasted a couple years before I decided to replace the color and I had reattached that one several times with no issues, so it’s possible I received a defective product, but it has a no return policy so there goes my $15. I’m not willing to test out that theory and purchase again if it can’t hold up for even a month.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't remain stuck
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple of weeks, this item slid to the side then came off. I've had to re-stick it back on at first... now it won't stick at all. You'd expect to get more of a reliable product. I feel like I've purchased a totally defective product. Dealing with this vendor sucks! I've sent them a pic of the pop socket... they didn't get it. Resent. Now they want my Amazon invoice. It seems like a lot of work on my part to get a $10.00 item replaced. I just went to Walmart and purchased a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: This frosted pink color is super cute with my pink phone. It was in perfect condition when I received it. No scratches. I’m pretty hard on my phone and I don’t think it scratches easily. There’s a couple, but they’re not visible. Looks great. I love pop sockets and can’t imagine being without one now. It’s perfect for holding my phone for reading and taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsticky
customer_reviews.text: I really love this popsocket, as I got it so it could match with my cases but the stickiness is just not there... after about three weeks of having it, it starts to pop off. The rest of the popsocket is in perfect condition but when I reached out to the vendor ( as I purchased the warranty too ) about getting new stickies, I was turned down because it was due to "normal wear and tear". After three weeks? REALLY? Even after purchasing the lifetime warranty? I even got one in black for my boyfriend and his stickiness is off as well... I got lifetime warranties for both of them and cannot get new stickies... not cool.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I had a pop socket for my previous phone and loved it. This one however will not stay on my phone. I have dropped my phone while trying to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great/works well
customer_reviews.text: Matches my rose gold Spigen case perfectly. I didn’t want something that stood out or clashed w the color of the case, so I’m super happy with this pop socket. Sticks well and reduces cramping in my hands when I’m texting or looking at my phone.
customer_reviews.author: jth

customer_reviews.title: Changed manufacturing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Popsocket for over a year, it was so perfect that it held the adhesive even when I switched phone cases. Super comfortable and great. WELL. I am guessing they cheapened the manufacturing because 1) It’s super painful to hold and leaves marks digging into my fingers and 2) The adhesive is terrible!!! I’m so upset and annoyed!! Sell outs!!!
customer_reviews.author: sgsgsg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap dont wast your money on it.
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap and cracked the minute I put it on my cell. Dont waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay
customer_reviews.text: I love pop sockets and have bought quite a few in the past for various phones and cases. HOWEVER, for whatever reason this one does not stick. I've tried a few tips I found online to try and get it to work, but it keeps falling off. Since it is brand new there is no reason for it not to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi K

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Bout because my old one (same manufacturer) was pretty worn. Applied as directed but very disappointed, this is either a fake or I received a bad one. Either way, it wouldn’t stay put on my phone even for a day so I had to throw it away. Bummer. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lex_mf

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive sucks
customer_reviews.text: I got this rose gold pop socket on Friday and fell off by Sunday. I’ve had one before on my old phone and it was really hard to get off. Not sure why this adhesive on this was is trash. Pretty bummed I paid $15 for it and it didn’t last at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Had one where the disk was plastic for a few months, but that started to break, so I decided to buy a metal one. Do yourself a favor and just buy the metal one first! I noticed a few people complained the base didn't stick to their phone case, I actually didn't use the base that came with this one since I already had a pop socket, just replaced the plastic disk with this one, so idk if the base is an issue. Definitely more durable than the plastic and I think it looks better too
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Best little invention ever!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing has saved my life. I recently cut my hand and have been unable to use it. I bought the pop socket to see if it would help me hold my phone better. It did! It was definitely a game changer for me. I also bought a pop socket mount that hooks to the air vent in my car. It’s just to easy!
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie cude

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it..
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed in this product. I was replacing my 2 year old popsocket and this one will NOT stay on! I’ve had to go and spend more money and wait another week for new adhesive to come in. I can’t say it’s a case issue because my previous one had no problem sticking, in-fact when I got a new phone it was almost impossible to get it off my old case and put it on the current. All in all, I would not recommend due to inability to stick! Why spend money on something that is utterly useless because you can’t get it to remain in place?
customer_reviews.author: Cassey

customer_reviews.title: Great if you never move them
customer_reviews.text: I love having a pop socket its one of the best accessories for my phone ever. the only downside is the pop covering usually seems to always fall off after a year and if you ever have to remove it, don't expect it to stick again
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone from slipping from my hand
customer_reviews.text: This not only makes it easier to hold onto the phone when I am talking and even texting, it also makes it easier to hang onto when I am on the move. Very good idea. I offset it on the back to easily hold the phone and allow me to text with one hand. I have had it for months and it is still stuck tightly.
customer_reviews.author: LOLShopping

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion didn’t last long before it started sliding around. I am super disappointed because it looked great with my case! I’ve been using pop sockets since they came out on different cases. I’ve never had one slide around like this one did!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gravitt

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic version
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom's phone. She likes this version much better than the plastic version she had before. We cleaned her phone case before sticking this on. She hasn't had a problem with the adhesive so far.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: wish the adhesive was stronger
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this pop socket. It makes it so easy to hold the phone and take pictures but I have had this pop socket for just over 2 moths and I can’t keep it on my phone it is continually falling off. Considering I can buy several other pop sockets for under $10 I would think for $14.99 it would hold for more than two months. I was so excited to receive this product but I have to admit I’m very disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my rose gold iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I've received several compliments from people who wonder how I got a pop socket that matches my phone. I love this design. Functional and slick in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Papaya Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I wasn’t sure if I needed a pop socket, but after buying this product i realized I cannot live without it! My hands are not used to holding the phone w the pop socket and actually begins to hurt if I do NOT have it on. Some reviews mentioned issues with adhesive - but I have not had any. If anything, I’ve had people bump my arm / hand and the pop socket has helped save the phone from dropping. Love the product. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Nisha Choksi

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this. I was worried it might not stick well since my phone case has a little bit of texture to it but it hasn't come loose or off even once on its own in the 2 months I've had so far. I even moved it once myself and it has still stayed on great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stick to any cases
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to protect my phone with a case at all times, unfortunately you cannot use this with any case material, it seem to stick but will come off any time. Not reliable with a case! otherwise I'm sure its great but I don't risk dropping my phone with no protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Self adhesive. Pink color is shiny and almost metal like. When you tap your nails on it it makes the metal clinking sound vs what plastic would. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Kyser

customer_reviews.title: Does what’s its supposed and looks cute doing it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pop socket. Works perfectly and the adhesion is great. Looks so cute with my case. No scratches and I’ve had it awhile. Dropped it 100 times and still is very sturdy. Well worth it can’t have a phone without a pop socket now.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena stagner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple device
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Pretty simple device. Good little device! I discounted one star because even when closed, it is a bit snug sliding into a back pocket. So if you could make it a bit thinner...so it collapses into a smaller size, that would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tsu Nami

customer_reviews.title: Great Pop
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! It has stayed on my phone without any problems. I do have to remove the cap to charge on wireless charger but it’s easy to do. Looks great with my case.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn’t last forever, starts fading.
customer_reviews.text: The color is fading and rubbing off after not lmtoo long with it. It’s also popped off a couple times. There are some ring things on it where the color has rubbed off. Works great like a pop socket should though
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Blatchford

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive isn’t good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought many many pop sockets in my day. But this one is terrible. I placed it on my phone case and it keeps coming off. I applied as directed and as I have done with my precious ones. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leah N Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It matches my phone case, stays put, and makes holding my phone way easier! I used to prop my phone up with my pinky finger and that would really hurt after a while. This makes holding my phone way easier and less taxing on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Came with Scratches
customer_reviews.text: It blows my mind that a pop socket costs $15 to begin. This one came with dark brown scratches on it largely across the middle and it's color was extremely faded. I ended up putting it on my phone anyway because my case already has scratches and the return process wasn't worth it to me, but I would absolutely not buy it again and don't recommend a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Celia M

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they're reusable! Becareful though if your phone is a glass back. I dropped my phone with the pop socket extended and the impact pushed the popsocket and cracked my phone in that area under my case!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this PopSocket! The rose gold coloring is so attractive and the black base is discreet. Pops up easily and collapses flat. I would highly recommend this product. Was delivered within a week of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lee K.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pink pop socket for a while now and have had no problems. It adheres well, I use it a lot and mess with it a lot when I'm bored and it sticks, doesn't break, and works well. It's a bit scratched, but I'm not careful with it at all and the scratches aren't super noticeable and look fine unless you're looking at it up close.
customer_reviews.author: Kasha M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stick
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived fine yet when i tried to stick it to my flat surfaced phone case it had no adhesion whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Nohemi A.

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky enough
customer_reviews.text: I love this color pop socket but it does scratch easy. It is not that sticky it has fallen off many times but then I am able to put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Schmatz

customer_reviews.title: Metal!
customer_reviews.text: My first PopSocket was plastic and eventually cracked and fell apart. Since this one is metal, I shouldn't have that problem. It matches my rose iphone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The adhesion sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This popsocket does not stay stuck. It literally came off my phone later on the very first day I put it on. I have to keep putting it back on. I had another popsocket that I got from Best Buy and it literally wouldn’t come off at all, it took me forever to get it off my phone. This was really a waste of money. & now it officially has stopped sticking and I have had it for all of 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Pops off instead of just up
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stick. Pops off all the time. I know it’s a “pop” socket, but it shouldn’t pop off all the time. I love the look of it, however.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. H. O'BRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Received Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to get this, but received it with a large scratch across the front. I don’t remember reading that this item isn’t eligible for returns, but apparently that’s the case.
customer_reviews.author: T Hos

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this pop socket. Not only does it look great, but it also feels great. It makes it easy for me to watch videos and it makes it easier to hold my phone
customer_reviews.author: Zaria Williams

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This rose gold pop socket is gorgeous and i have had it for a couple of weeks and it is sturdy and helps alot with handling your phone! I have gotten alot of complements
customer_reviews.author: Roxanacglz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love that this pop socket is metal and feels durable. I’ve been using it for a week and I can already say I love it more then the other 3 plastic pop sockets I’ve bought. The color is true to the image. It makes holding my IPhone Xs Max easy and complfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Montaño

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pop socket and I love it! I have a rose gold Kate Spade iPhone case and this matches it perfectly! I have no issues with it coming off, it’s very secure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick
customer_reviews.text: I have been using pop sockets for years so I know how they should work, but this is not it. Received this one three days ago and have been resticking this one to my phone more than five times per day. My last one was on my phone case for a year and a half with absolutely no problems. I put this one on the exact same case and have had nothing but problems. Do not bother buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Did not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: I have pop sockets before and none have fallen off. This one came off with hours. And no returns even tho that was not listed in the return policy.

customer_reviews.title: On my second one
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I replaced my last PopSocket after 1 year is because the rose-gold case looked worn while the rose-gold PopSocket still looked terrific. A nifty invention!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: No stick
customer_reviews.text: Adhesion of this is worthless. I have an old one just like this and it stuck until I switched cases then it stuck on it forever. Now I got this new one and it won’t stick to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: Love it in one place- its almost impossible to move around
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Ended up buying for my mom too. - downside i discovered today. I followed the directions on how to move the pop socket but its extremely difficult to move around and I almost broke the back of my phone trying to take it off. Definitely not easy, or even able to move around "as many times as you want" as the product claims.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesive quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this exact same product and used it for three years without a problem and was very satisfied. This new one I had on less than a week and it fell off twice and I lost it. Very disappointed! I should have listen to the reviews that the adhesive was not good on these. I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Color is great; Doesnt stick!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 pop sockets before and this is the first one that doesn't stick. I live by popsockets to make it easier to hold my phone, so I'm sad it does stick to my case. (my phone case is plastic). The color is fine, no scratches it. Just doesn't stick and I will be holding my phone and it falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY POPSOCKET
customer_reviews.text: This PopSocket is the perfect rosy gold I have been looking for! Was a replacement from an older black one. Love this one, easy to apply and reapply!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn't stick!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this pop socket but it won't stick! It's constantly falling off & making me drop my phone...buyer beware, the adhesive on this one isn't good!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: USELESS, AWFUL, WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a ZERO I would!!! It wouldn't stick to flat clean surface iphone and it came scratched! My 10 year old daughter who couldn't wait to receive it was extremely disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ria W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and nice but doesn’t stay
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, I love the aluminum! However it does not want to stay on. The last phone I had I could not get the pop socket off no matter what and had it for 3 years. This one lasted a week. Would of bought another one but saw reviews with several having the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Pop sockit 👍
customer_reviews.text: Good to pop lock a drop it lol jk don't drop your phone. But helps hold her big iPhone better with them lil hands
customer_reviews.author: Robby B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this a couple months and the adhesive part no longer works at all. So it has become useless. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best pop socket
customer_reviews.text: Its been a little over a year since i bought it and i can only recommend this pop socket. Its very durable and the adhesive STICKS... it maybe came off twice since i had it and it was my fault because it got too hot around that area from charging and holding at the same time. But it reattached just fine. Definitely would buy
customer_reviews.author: Tatjana Speller

customer_reviews.title: Poor Adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if it would stick! Disappointing. I cleaned the back of the phone case first and after 1 week it Is releasing when I hold it . I have purchased off brand sockets for half the price with better adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect! Good size, fun and easy to hold, looks so pretty!!! The only thing I would say is to make sure you push hard and hold it longer when putting it on your phone case. Mine keeps falling off now cuz I didn't hold it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Get a grip!
customer_reviews.text: This handy little device makes it easier for me to hold onto my phone. I recently visited several waterfalls in Vermont and was able to photograph them with confidence knowing that I wasn’t gonna drop my phone into the water!!
customer_reviews.author: donnalu

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well and stuck on the phone without any ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well and stuck on the phone without any issues. Never came off. Need to buy a new one because it was stuck (as intended) to my last case that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Talia K

customer_reviews.title: Terrible adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve ordered this exact pop socket and it worked okay for a while but then the hard top popped off. Then, I just ordered a second one and the adhesive isn’t sticky at all so it doesn’t work. Pretty frustrating. I submitted a request to the manufacturer so I guess we’ll see what they do, but I’m expecting a new one at no cost.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Rudesill

customer_reviews.title: Popsocket drop it :-)
customer_reviews.text: Nice popsocket. Stays in place. It also collapses when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Iyana Gray Reese

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I just received my pop socket today, and right out of the packaging it has black smudges along with a few scratches that will not come off. I need the product for an upcoming trip so I don’t have time to return it and wait for a new one, but for spending almost $15 on this, I am bummed out with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I had mine on my phone for months. The grip eventually started falling off and I had to reattach it almost everyday. Cute look!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pop socket. The color is pretty and it is nice and shiny. It looks high quality. It has stayed on great and helps me feel more secure while holding my phone. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: AngChick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Cute color, functional, just hoping it doesn’t break at some point like a different branded one did. But love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work long term
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It was exactly what I wanted. My issue was that after 2 months it fell off. I gave up on it and threw it anyway. Was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fool me once...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this twice-the first one stayed on for 6 months, no trouble. Never came off. Then I got a new phone case so I ordered another one-the old one was so good at staying on I couldn’t get it off the old case, but I wasn’t upset since it had done it’s job. Now the new one has fallen off 10+ times. Why? Who knows. I ordered again because the first one was exactly what I wanted in every way and now I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a messed up one but it doesn't stick to my phone. It keeps coming off. And they're not supposed to do that. Once you stick on that should be stuck on there until you rip it off basically.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other pop sockets before so I had an expectation. This was is really cute and seems well made. I’ve never had a pop socket come off so easily. It doesn’t adhere well at all. I have to reapply it multiple times a day. If this thing falls off one more time, I’m going to burn it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 days. Not sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Liked product at first because it was super easy to pop up and hold but product broke within a two day period. Very disappointing. Pictures to show.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but doesn’t stick!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with the look but the adhesive doesn’t stick to the silicone Apple case. Mine doesn’t seem like it came with 3M adhesive. Hoping I can go to Lowe’s and find something that will keep it in place better
customer_reviews.author: Vivian R Lasse

customer_reviews.text: Sorry but this product doesn’t work. After I believe week or two glue doesn’t stay put and few times it fell on my face. I want to live this product but doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Janki Bhatt

customer_reviews.title: Durable, perfect for gripping phone and variety of colors/ patterns.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Popsocket for over a year, i broke it off no fault of Popsocket, I bought an off brand and hated it.. HAD to get me another popsocket, wouldn't buy any other.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Color stays
customer_reviews.text: I love my pop socket. It’s the first mettalic colored item that hasn’t scratched or become worn down. Once you stick it on, it stays put. I’d definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn S.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK- Will not stick no wonder they have a no return
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the product for about 20 minutes and it’s already falling off my phone - The sticky on the back does not work and will not stick - i’ve been using pop sockets for years so this is very strange and now they will not give you a refund as that is their policy when they sell you this junk!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Wilson Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: Even my kindle has a popsocket now. The rose gold color matched the iPhone rose gold by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pop socket not even a week ago, I was taking a picture where some water is, my phone seriously fell in the water! I want a refund. That’s ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I lived without it
customer_reviews.text: Nicely color-coordinated with my rose gold Spigen case. Repositions fairly easily while holding on very firmly. Works extremely well as a two-position kickstand also.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. MacLean

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum rubs off
customer_reviews.text: The popsocket overall is great and I wanted to try out the aluminum for the looks. Unfortunately, after a few months the aluminum look starts to rub off. For my next popsocket I will just be getting a normal one - aluminum not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect my finger fit through it great sturdiness love it
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Spatola

customer_reviews.title: worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: just put it on my phone and it’s VERY hard to get off. if you put it where you want it the first time, that’s a good thing! i’ll update this as i use it, but right now it’s definitely worth the money! i love it. and very true to color (i got the rose gold one).
customer_reviews.author: Meara

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 5 months for me, and there’s a 2month travel trip...lasted longer than most I’ve bought 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: charmaine k.

customer_reviews.title: Xmas Present Already Popped Off
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this as a Christmas present, and it's already popped off her phone at least twice. Her previous one, not from this seller but from Staples, never popped off. Thankfully, it easily pops back on, however, I'm sure that's only going to happen a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia K.

product_meta.title: PopSockets: Collapsible Grip & Stand for Phones and Tablets - Aluminum Rose Gold
product_meta.description: A PopSockets grip is more than a stylish phone accessory. It’s an opposable thumb for your phone. It lets you take selfies like a pro and share with your circle of fans, friends or embarrassing family members. It lets you text things you may or may not later regret with the greatest of ease. It lets you stand your phone up on an airplane tray table to watch a movie. When you’re done, it collapses flat like your bangs in a rainstorm. PopSockets grips are repositionable and stick to most devices and cases but may not stick to silicone or waterproof materials. The product includes a special 3M adhesive disc for attaching your grip directly to a glass-backed phone. You may also buy a separate “mount” to attach your phone to your dashboard, mirror, refrigerator, air conditioning vent or wherever you snack on content. Mmm…content. And now, a little something for all you specification geeks: Diameter: 1.56 inches, Height: .9 inches when expanded, .25 inches when collapsed.
feature_bullets: Offers a secure grip so you can text with one hand, snap better photos, and stop phone drops
Functions as a convenient stand so you can watch videos on the fly
Allows for hands-free use with the PopSockets mount
Available in a broad range of styles and materials

Advanced reusable adhesive: repositionable, washable adhesive sticks to most cases, won't stick to silicone/highly textured cases. Packaging includes adhesive disc to apply directly to iPhone & other glass back phones

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,782 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
